title: Document Upload - Supported Formats
description: Verify that the Document Upload page accepts all specified file formats (PDF, TXT, DOC, DOCX, MD, JSON) via both drag-and-drop and file selector.

steps.description: Navigate to the Document Upload page.
Drag and drop a valid PDF file into the upload area.
Confirm the PDF file upload is accepted and processed with real-time feedback.
Use the file selector to upload a valid TXT file.
Confirm the TXT file upload is accepted and processed with real-time feedback.
Repeat drag-and-drop and file selector upload steps for DOC, DOCX, MD, and JSON files.
Verify each file format is accepted and processed with feedback.

title: Document Upload - Unsupported Formats Rejection
description: Verify that unsupported file formats are rejected and trigger appropriate error messages during upload.

steps.description: Navigate to the Document Upload page.
Attempt to upload unsupported file formats (e.g., EXE, JPG, MP4) via drag-and-drop and file selector.
Confirm each unsupported file is rejected with a clear real-time error message.

title: Chat Interface - Real-time Q&A
description: Verify that users can submit questions, receive AI-generated answers with loading indicators, and view conversation history with timestamps.

steps.description: Navigate to the Chat Interface page.
Enter a valid question related to an uploaded document in the chat input.
Submit the question.
Verify a loading indicator appears while awaiting the AI response.
Verify the AI-generated answer is displayed once ready.
Verify the conversation history includes the question and answer with accurate timestamps.

title: Chat Interface - Empty or Invalid Question Handling
description: Ensure that empty questions or invalid inputs are not submitted and the application prompts the user accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to the Chat Interface page.
Attempt to submit an empty chat input.
Verify submission is blocked and a validation error or toast notification is shown.
Attempt to submit whitespace or only special characters as a question.
Verify submission is blocked with appropriate user feedback.

title: AI Features - Document Summarization
description: Test that the automatic document summarization feature generates accurate, concise summaries quickly when triggered.

steps.description: Upload a multi-page document to the system.
Navigate to the Chat Interface with the uploaded document active.
Trigger the automatic document summarization via the Quick Action tool.
Verify a loading indicator displays while summary is being generated.
Verify that the summary is displayed accurately and is concise.

title: AI Features - CPA Agent Processing
description: Verify CPA Agent processing returns correct processed content and handles errors gracefully.

steps.description: Upload a compatible document.
In the Chat Interface, activate the CPA Agent for content processing.
Validate that CPA Agent returns processed content results.
Simulate RAG API failure or timeout when triggering CPA Agent.
Verify the app handles API errors gracefully, displaying helpful messages without crashing.

title: UI Accessibility - Keyboard Navigation and Screen Reader Support
description: Ensure all UI components, including chat inputs, buttons, menus, and dialogs, are fully operable via keyboard and accessible to screen readers.

steps.description: Navigate through the application using keyboard only (Tab, Shift+Tab, Enter, Space, Arrow keys).
Verify focus/state is visible and logical order follows accessibility best practices.
Use a screen reader to interact with components such as upload, chat interface, navigation, and dialogs.
Verify that all interactive elements have meaningful labels and are properly announced.

title: Navigation Bar - Responsiveness and Menu Functionality
description: Test that the navigation bar works correctly on desktop and mobile, with responsive menus, smooth scrolling, and active state highlighting.

steps.description: Load the application on desktop viewport.
Verify desktop menu is fully visible and functional.
Use navigation bar links and verify smooth scrolling to each page section.
Verify the active state indicator updates correctly as user navigates.
Resize viewport to mobile dimensions or use a mobile device.
Verify mobile menu is accessible via hamburger icon and opens/closes correctly.
Navigate between pages using the mobile menu.
Verify smooth transitions and correct active state updates.

title: Theme Provider - Dark and Light Mode Toggle with Persistence
description: Verify seamless toggling between dark and light modes, and that the chosen theme persists across user sessions.

steps.description: Start with default theme loaded.
Toggle theme from light to dark mode using the theme toggle control.
Verify application UI switches to dark mode instantly and is applied across all pages.
Reload the application or close and reopen the browser.
Verify that the last selected theme (dark) is preserved and loaded correctly.

title: RAG API Integration - Successful Document Upload and Query
description: Confirm successful interactions with the backend RAG API for document upload and question answering, maintaining session state.

steps.description: Upload a supported document through the UI.
Validate that the backend RAG API receives and processes the upload successfully.
Ask a question related to the uploaded document via the chat interface.
Confirm that the RAG API returns a valid answer and session state is maintained.

title: RAG API Integration - Error Handling and Retry Mechanism
description: Verify that errors from the RAG backend API during document upload or Q&A are handled gracefully with user feedback and offer retry options.

steps.description: Simulate API failure during document upload.
Check that a meaningful error message is displayed and upload is not silently dropped.
Simulate API failure during chat question submission.
Verify error is communicated to the user with options to retry the request.
Retry the failed request.
Confirm successful completion upon retry if API recovers.

title: Custom Hooks - Mobile Detection Hook Functionality
description: Test that the custom mobile detection hook correctly identifies device type and triggers responsive UI behaviors.

steps.description: Access the application from mobile and desktop devices or simulate via viewport resizing.
Verify the hook returns correct mobile detection state.
Confirm UI elements adapt appropriately based on the detected device type (e.g., menus, layout).

title: Toast Notifications - Display and Dismissal
description: Ensure custom toast notifications triggered by hooks display messages correctly and can be dismissed manually or auto-dismiss after a timeout.

steps.description: Trigger various toast notifications (success, error, info) throughout the app.
Verify that each toast appears with correct content and style.
Manually dismiss a toast notification via close button.
Verify the toast disappears immediately.
Verify non-dismissed toasts auto-dismiss after expected timeout.
